description: In some cases, Physical functions with VLAN are not being reported via the device's metadata, since info_cache shows as empty. Refreshing the info_cache before metadata creation solves the problem.
title: PFs with vlan are not being reported via devices metadata

comments.content: In some cases, Physical functions with VLAN are not being reported via the device's metadata, since info_cache shows as empty. Refreshing the info_cache before metadata creation solves the problem.
